title: Procurement Risk Intelligence
subtitle: AI-detected anomalies, structural corruption patterns, and investigation signals

anomalies.title: AI-Detected Anomalies
anomalies.subtitle: Statistical outliers and structural irregularities flagged by the risk model

riskFactors.title: Risk Factor Deep Dive
riskFactors.subtitle: How each flag performs against 26,582 documented corruption contracts
riskFactors.frequencySubtitle: How many contracts trigger each risk factor
riskFactors.effectivenessSubtitle: How much more likely each factor appears in known-corrupt contracts vs. baseline. Lift > 1 = diagnostic signal.
riskFactors.heatmapSubtitle: How often two risk factors appear together (lift > 1 = correlated). Higher lift = stronger association.

decemberRush.title: December Rush Intelligence
decemberRush.subtitle: Year-end spending spike analysis — budget dumps and procurement timing anomalies
decemberRush.yearsWithSpikes: {{n}} of {{total}} years showed significant year-end spikes

collusion.title: Collusion Signals
collusion.subtitle: Co-bidding patterns and market concentration alerts flagged by the AI
collusion.coBiddingSubtitle: Vendors that consistently appear in the same procedures — potential bid-rigging
collusion.concentrationSubtitle: Institutions where a single vendor holds disproportionate market share
collusion.empty: No collusion signals detected at this threshold

highRiskFlows.title: High-Risk Money Flows
highRiskFlows.subtitle: Institution → vendor flows where average risk score ≥ 30% — prioritize for investigation

leads.title: Investigation Leads
leads.subtitle: AI-ranked investigation priorities based on anomaly pattern strength
leads.empty: No investigation leads generated at this time
